name: spotu20145-speed, internal vibrator
about: What it is:A handheld, curved vibrator meant for internal stimulation..Highlighted Features:- 100 Percent Platinum-Grade Silicone: An FDA-approved, body-safe material..What Else You Need to Know:Made with 100 percent platinum-grade silicone, this soft-touch, five-speed vibrator is discreet and easy to use. It has a runtime of up to two hours, is charged via USB, and is water-resistant and phthalate- and latex-free..This Device Comes With:- Natural-canvas travel pouch.Due to health & safety reasons, this item is FINAL SALE and cannot be returned or exchanged for cash, credit, or otherwise.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Your vibrator will arrive in travel mode. Simply hold the button for three seconds and wait for two quick, high-speed vibrations accompanied by two flashes of light. .-To exit travel mode, hold the button again for another three seconds. .-When charging, itu2019s recommended that you plug your device directly into a wall outlet with a USB adapter (versus plugging into a device's USB port, like a computer). .-Tip of device needs to be fully inserted to charge..-Light should turn on when charging and turn off when complete..-This device runs on a lithium-ion battery, so there will be battery drainage over time. .-Charge your device after every use for optimal life span. .-If battery drains completely, your device will no longer work and cannot be charged. ..Charging time: .-1.5 to two hours...Run time: .One to 1.5 hours (highest speed)/two to 2.5 hours (lowest speed).
